data.comment: Bert Put starts the match. Mouscron with the kick-off in Mouscron.
Goal! Gent have got their heads in front thanks to a Niklas Dorsch strike.
In the minute 21, An attacking Gent player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Saad Agouzoul (Mouscron) has received a first yellow card.
Wim De Decker is making the team's first substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Vadis Odjidja replacing Sven Kums.
In the minute 40, Imad Faraj is replacing Dimitri Mohamed for the home team.
Bert Put blows to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Gent kick-off.
In the minute 68, Gent make their second substitution with Osman Bukari replacing Jordan Botaka.
Tim Kleindienst is replacing Laurent Depoitre for Gent at Stade Le Canonnier.
The home team replace Serge Tabekou with Capita.
In the minute 77, Fernando Da Cruz (Mouscron) is making a third substitution, with Charles-Andreas Brym replacing Beni Badibanga.
Alessandro Ciranni (Mouscron) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Benjamin van Durmen (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
